page.title: 01SUMMARY OF 'D' BLOCK
page.content: Our block is mostly sea,which is called Falmouth Bay.It is in the South West of England,in Cornwall.People come to Falmouth,because it is near to the sea for boats.The weather is normally mild.We hardly ever get lots of snow,or much frost,but we get lots of rain. The summer is the best of the year in {Falmouth }because you can use the beaches for sunbathing and swimming. We have several different beaches in our block,and our quite sandy. Falmouth is very popular with holiday makers.It has the usual conveniences such as shops,hospitals,parks,public houses,youth clubs,cinema,but also has a castle,caravan and camping sites,holiday flats and nice walks by the sea.{
